:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1900 Dual-Band Modem Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-CG7500/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=CG7500|pid=01t340000042fhTAAQ}} *[http://www.linksys.com/us/pressreleases/linksys-introduces-new-docsis-cable-modems-and-modem-routers-at-ces-2016/ Press Release] DOCSIS 3.0 24x8 modem. It is using a ''[[Intel Puma]] 6'' chipset.. :(up to 960Mbps Download, up to 240 Mbps Upload){{CableModemSpec |down_c=24 |up_c=8 }}
